main event: Pilots returning from a mission observed one round and bright object hovering for 2 minutes at Kunsan AB, Korea.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes, The object was described as round and bright by multiple pilots, The observation was made during a return from a mission, Air Intelligence reported insufficient data for evaluation, All witnesses interviewed individually agreed in substance regarding their observations.
witness description: pilots and air policemen returning from a mission
